Minute Entry for proceedings held before US Magistrate Judge Silvia Carreno-Coll: Arraignment/Detention Hearings as to Saul Guzman-Font (2) Count 1,2 held on 5/23/2014. AUSA Alberto Lopez and defense counsel Anita Hill were present. As to Arraignment, the Court finds defendant competent at this time. Defendant waived the reading of the Indictment. Plea of Not Guilty is entered. Defense is granted seven (7) days to obtain discovery and fourteen (14) days thereafter to file all motions. The case is referred to the Judge for trial setting thereafter. As to Detention, the Government proffered defendant's role and/or participation, defendant is facing a minimum of 10 years, defendant is a risk of flight and danger to the community. Defense counsel proffered that defendant's father is willing to serve as third party custodian and the grandmother willing to post her house as collateral for bail. The parties met at side bar. After listening to the parties, the Court ordered defendant detained without bail pending trial. If the proffer of the Government is not backed up, defense may reopen the matter of bail. (Court Reporter FTR/bg.) Hearing set for 10:00. Hearing held at 10:24. Hearing ended at 10:52. Interpreter Janis Palma. (br) Modified on 5/28/2014 re typo. (re). (Entered: 05/26/2014)
